name: VERSION_TREE_ID
documentation:
Version tree identifier for one version. Lexical form: 

`trunk_version [  '.' branch_number  '.' branch_version ]`

trunk_version.name: trunk_version
trunk_version.documentation: Trunk version number; numbering starts at 1.

is_branch.name: is_branch
is_branch.documentation: True if this version identifier represents a branch, i.e. has `_branch_number()_` and `_branch_version()_` parts.

branch_number.name: branch_number
branch_number.documentation: Number of branch from the trunk point; numbering starts at 1.

branch_version.name: branch_version
branch_version.documentation: Version of the branch; numbering starts at 1.

invariants.Trunk_version_valid: trunk_version /= Void and then trunk_version.is_integer and then trunk_version.as_integer >= 1
invariants.Branch_number_valid: branch_number /= Void implies branch_number.is_integer and then branch_number.as_integer >= 1
invariants.Branch_version_valid: branch_version /= Void implies branch_version.is_integer and then branch_version.as_integer >= 1
invariants.Branch_validity: (branch_number = Void and branch_version = Void ) xor (branch_number /= Void and branch_version /= Void )
